metadata.title: CVE-2023-25588 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Binutils. The field `the_bfd` of `asymbol`struct isuninitialized in the `bfd_mach_o_get_synthetic_symtab` function, which maylead to an application crash and local denial of service.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
